attributes.action: Shut down the construction industry, help construction buisnesses pay wages
attributes.additional_details:
Because the construction industry can not work from home all you are doing by keeping them going is spreading covid-19 

PROTECT the British public 
Help us stay home and we will saves lives

KEEP HELPING TO STOP COVID-19 KILLING OUR LOVED ONES !!!!!
attributes.background:
Shut down the construction industry, help construction buisnesses pay wages freeze finances and help with outgoings

Make sure people in the building, concrete and haulage trade have help 
Employees and self employed 

Stop spreading covid-19 and stay at home and save lives
